extendedInfo.description: The ultimate entertainment app for sharing your opinion and voting on almost any topic in our interactive quizzes, surveys, and online polls.In addition to being the judge and part of the quora by offering your thoughts and opinion on an endless collection of interesting questions, you can also see current results in realtime and also upload your own surveys once you comment on and vote in more than one opinion poll.After you answer each inquiry in several topics including movies, logos, songs, news, gossip and more, you can instantly see how others respond to each query at hand.  Then when you want to ask questions of your own, be sure to use our easy uploader to start your own rivalry or controversy.  Or just be a polar poller and pose interesting survey polls to see how people think and what they care about most.  Great for those who are curious, nosy, like to gossip, or just want to interview and interrogate and learn from others.  Very fun from psychology and market research perspective as well.Sample questions:Best Messenger App?  WhatsApp or Viber?  WeChat or Cubie? Facebook or Line: Free Calls?Do you prefer Talkray or Tango for free calls and text?Grumpy Bears or Candy Crush Saga?Best TV - Sony or Samsung?Push Services - informative or intrusive?Top GPS: Waze or Google Maps?Who will win Masters 2013: Tiger Woods or Someone Else?Better car - BMW or Mercedes?Preference - ChatOn or Kakao Talk?Who's cuter? Hello Kitty or Garfield?Better Browser?  Opera or Firefox?  Dolphin or Chrome?Best running game - Subway Surfers or Temple Run 2?4 Pics 1 Word Puzzle or Sodoku Classic?Who is a better singer - Justin Bieber or Justin Timberlake?Who is the best NBA Game Player of All Time?  What is tastier - Burger King or McDonalds?Favorite Toy - Gi Joe or Legos?Pou or Tamagachi?Do you prefer Coke or Pepsi?Killer App: Cinegram or Instagram?Favorite Casino game: Slots or Bingo?Better Games: Zynga or Mobage?Coming soon we are adding a new invite feature which will allow you to share and invite friends from Whatsapp, Viber, WeChat, and Facebook Messenger.  We will also be adding new import options such as Cinegram, Instagram, and Flickr.Types of content include many types:Yes Or No: Do you like it?Hot Or Not: Is the celebrity, actor, model, or regular person hot or are they not?A or B: Which do you prefer?This Or That: ThisHip Or Hop: Is it Trendy or Out of Fashion?In order to upload a new poll:1) choose the upload icon (up arrow)2) select content type (poll)3) upload photos using the image icon or search for them using the search icon4) upload 2 photos if you want them side-by-side or just 1 photo if you want a solo photo5) Add a question and 2 answers6) Add at least one tag7) Click "Submit" at the upper-right part of the app

reviews.title: Not sure how to upload a new poll?
reviews.comment: Easy! Just follow the step-by-step guide in app\'s description to begin voting now

reviews.comment: The question which arouse most\302\240attention now: what is the\302\240best Messenger App?\tI believe\302\240Viber or Whatsapp are 2 giants, but other voters think Asian\302\240competitors will dominate this field in the near future: Line (Japan), Kakaotalk (S.Korea), Wechat (China) & Zalo (Vietnam)
